title: Thesis or Research Project
description: A master template for undergraduate, graduate, or independent research projects, suitable for proposals, research logs, and final reports.

hypotheses.description: Clearly state the research hypothesis or guiding research question.

materials.description: Datasets, instruments, software, libraries, participants, and other resources.

experiment.description: Methodology: design, sampling, procedures, protocols, or experimental setup.

observation & data.description: Field notes, observations, raw data summaries, and data management notes.

results.description: Key findings after analysis (statistics, figures, tables).

conclusion.description: Interpretation, implications, limitations, and future work.

questions & research.description: Literature review notes, citations, and open research questions.

headshots.description: Researcher headshot image URLs or file references.
